drawMesh

public void drawMesh(java.lang.String name,
                     float[] vertices,
                     int[] triangles)
sets a mesh primitive

Parameters:
name - individual name of primitive
vertices - Float array with coordinates (like [x0,y0,z0,x1,y1,z1,x2,y2,z2])
triangles - int array connecting the vertices (like [0,1,2])
